channel.title: Rust on XeroExecute Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Rust on XeroExecute Blog

item.title: Rust Tickler 3
item.author: sir_xxxx@protonmail.com (XeroExecute Blog)
item.description: Multi-stage Rust reverse engineering challenge containing different input validation cryptographic algorithms. Solved through dynamic analysis and memory extraction techniques to recover embedded secrets from custom PRNG XOR cipher and AES-256-CBC implementations.
